results.title: Effect of metformin as an add-on therapy on neuregulin-4 levels and vascular-related complications in adolescents with type 1 diabetes: A randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: This randomized placebo-controlled trial included 80 @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_603933</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603933 @@@microvascular complications@@@ who were randomly divided to receive either 24 weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 500 mg/day or matching placebo.

results.title: Optimal glycemic control in type 2 diabetic patients. Does including insulin treatment mean a better outcome?
results.text_hl: Both @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have been shown to significantly reduce the risk of @<m>DISEASE_603933</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603933 @@@microvascular complications@@@.
